name: Crazy Car (Funktion)
description:
MADE IN 72 HOURS

Play as Jimmy - Jimmy is a really dumb guy.. So dumb that he always fails his car license test! Good thing is, his instructor always gives him another chance, telling him that "Failure is progress".

The game consists of being Jimmy: Really dumb guy that keeps destroying things  (failing his test) to progress through levels.

Submission to Wowie Jam 3.0: Made in 72 hours.

Made by: Funktion & Music by: Extrinity

IF YOU PLAY ON BROWSER

If you play on browser, make sure to fullscreen it, there might be problems with fullscreen but it's something I've been trying to figure out and unfortunately can't fix it. Also, please keep in mind that the quality will be a lot lower than the standalone version (No post processing, low shadows, etc.).
